description.raw:
The gazebo_dart_2.1 branch is ready to merge into gazebo_2.2 (pull request #850), but it is a more complicated merge to default due to conflicts and some new API's that must be implemented. This pull request will fix all problems with a merge to default.

The branch gazebo_dart could be merged directly to default, but it would be difficult to see the changed code, so I created the branch default_gazebo_dart_2.1 in 4fbb6b0 by:
~~~
hg pull
hg up default
hg branch default_gazebo_dart_2.1
hg merge gazebo_dart_2.1
~~~
and then resolving conflicts in Server.hh and Joint_TEST.cc.

Once this pull request is approved, I will merge pull request #850 to gazebo_2.2, then merge default_gazebo_dart_2.1 to default.
